insert into money_report (cid, year, debt_financing_line, debt_financing_cost, equity_financing_line, equity_financing_cost, internal_financing_and_trade_financing_line, internal_financing_and_trade_financing_costs, project_financing_and_policy_financing_quotas, project_financing_and_policy_financing_costs) values
( #{item.cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.debtFinancingLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.debtFinancingCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{item.equityFinancingLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equityFinancingCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.internalFinancingAndTradeFinancingLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.internalFinancingAndTradeFinancingCosts,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{item.projectFinancingAndPolicyFinancingQuotas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectFinancingAndPolicyFinancingCosts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )
